thread.title: Immigrants Connected to Sanctuary Movement Arrested

author: Ian Lovett
title: Immigrants Connected to Sanctuary Movement Arrested
text:
A Mexican immigrant associated with a movement to shelter undocumented immigrants in places of worship was arrested by federal officials Thursday, his family members said, a move religious groups called a blow to their efforts.
Eliseo Jurado, the partner of a Peruvian woman taking sanctuary in a Colorado church, is the third person associated with the sanctuary movement to be detained over the past week, advocates said. He was detained by federal immigration officials Thursday at a grocery store near his home north of Denver,...
